name: UpdateBoardImage
description:
Update an image item on a Miro board using a URL.

Use this tool to update an existing image item on a specific Miro board by providing the image URL. Requires 'boards:write' scope and is subject to Level 2 rate limiting.

parameters.name: board_identifier
parameters.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board where the image item will be updated.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board where you want to update the item.

parameters.name: image_item_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the image item to update on the board.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the item that you want to update.

parameters.name: image_title
parameters.description: A short text header to identify the image on the board.

value_schema.description: A short text header to identify the image.

parameters.name: image_url
parameters.description: The URL of the image to update on the board.

value_schema.description: URL of the image.

parameters.name: x_axis_coordinate
parameters.description: X-axis coordinate for the item's location on the board. The board's center is at x: 0. Default is 0.

value_schema.description:
X-axis coordinate of the location of the item on the board.
By default, all items have absolute positioning to the board, not the current viewport. Default: `0`.
The center point of the board has `x: 0` and `y: 0` coordinates.

parameters.name: y_axis_coordinate_position
parameters.description: The Y-axis coordinate for placing the item on the board. Default is `0`, with absolute positioning on the board.

value_schema.description:
Y-axis coordinate of the location of the item on the board.
By default, all items have absolute positioning to the board, not the current viewport. Default: `0`.
The center point of the board has `x: 0` and `y: 0` coordinates.

parameters.name: image_height_pixels
parameters.description: Specify the height of the image item in pixels.

value_schema.description: Height of the item, in pixels.

parameters.name: image_width_in_pixels
parameters.description: The width of the image item on the board, specified in pixels.

value_schema.description: Width of the item, in pixels.

parameters.name: item_rotation_angle
parameters.description: Specify the rotation angle for the image item in degrees. Use positive values for clockwise and negative for counterclockwise rotation.

value_schema.description: Rotation angle of an item, in degrees, relative to the board. You can rotate items clockwise (right) and counterclockwise (left) by specifying positive and negative values, respectively.

parameters.name: parent_frame_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the parent frame for the item.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the parent frame for the item.
